Reimbursed Medical Expenses
Do not allow a deduction for any medical expenses for which the claimant expects to be reimbursed.
If a medical expense deduction is allowed and the claimant later receives reimbursement for that expense, recalculate IVAP for the applicableÂ reporting period based on actual expenses paid.
